attributes.action: raise as much revenue as possible from direct income tax rather than V.A.T. etc
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I realise, of course, that no one likes paying tax but all services provided by the Government have to be paid for by SOME form of taxation and income tax is the fairest way to do this (it would be even fairer if very high earners paid substantially more and the tax allowance was raised for low earners).  EVERYONE, even those on Income Support and Pension Credit, has to pay the same amount of V.A.T. charged; and of course everything it is charged on is luxury goods since it's charged, for instance, on fuel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
